version.author: Meo-Ada Mespotine
version.changelog:
Ultraschall Framework - Changelog
5.1 - Beach Boys - Wind Chimes - 11th of December 2024
Has now 1834 functions, with 27 new ones
new in this release:
- Link UI-Elements to Extstates/Config Variables/Ini-File-Values and Toggle-states That way, you can easily link ui-elements to these states. So if the state is updated, the ui-element gets immediately updated. And if the ui-element gets altered, the linked state gets updated too. Making a settings-dialog for i.e.the most used preferences has never been easier to do.
- MetaData Extraction Theres a new function that extracts the cover image of a media file for further use.
New features in 5.1
- MetaData: Metadata_ExtractCover - extracts the cover-image from a file - ReaGirl: Checkbox_LinkToConfigVar - link a checkbox-state to a config-variable - ReaGirl: Checkbox_LinkToExtstate - link a checkbox-state to an extstate - ReaGirl: Checkbox_LinkToIniValue - link a checkbox-state to an ini-value - ReaGirl: Checkbox_LinkToToggleState - link a checkbox-state to a toggle-state - ReaGirl: Checkbox_Unlink - remove link of an inputbox with an ini-file-entry/configvar/extstate/toggle-state - ReaGirl: Color_EnumerateNames - enumerate available html-color-names - ReaGirl: Color_GetColorValuesByName - gets the color-values by html-color-name - ReaGirl: Color_GetName - gets the colorname by r,g,b-values - ReaGirl: DropDownMenu_LinkToExtstate - links a drop-down-menu to an extstate - ReaGirl: DropDownMenu_LinkToIniValue - links a drop-down-menu to an ini-file-entry - ReaGirl: DropDownMenu_Unlink - remove link of a drop-down-menu with an ini-file-entry/extstate - ReaGirl: Ext_IsAnyReaGirlGuiHovered - returns, if the mouse is currently hovering above any ReaGirl-gui-window - ReaGirl: Ext_UI_Element_GetHovered - returns the ReaGirl-window and ui-element the mouse is currently hovering above - ReaGirl: Ext_Window_GetInstances - returns the currently opened ReaGirl-window-instances - ReaGirl: Gui_GetCurrentScriptInstance - returns the currents gui-script-identifier and gui-name - ReaGirl: Inputbox_LinkToConfigVar - link an inputbox to a string config-variable - ReaGirl: Inputbox_LinkToExtstate - link an inputbox to an extstate - ReaGirl: Inputbox_LinkToIniValue - link an inputbox to an ini-file - ReaGirl: Inputbox_Unlink - remove link of an inputbox with an ini-file-entry/configvar/extstate - ReaGirl: Label_GetLabelText - gets the current text of a label - ReaGirl: Slider_LinkToDoubleConfigVar - link a slider to a double-config-variable - ReaGirl: Slider_LinkToExtstate - link a slider to an extstate - ReaGirl: Slider_LinkToIniValue - link a slider to an ini-file-entry - ReaGirl: Slider_LinkToIntConfigVar - link a slider to an integer-config-variable - ReaGirl: Slider_Unlink - remove link of a slider with an ini-file-entry/configvar/extstate - ReaGirl: Tutorials - a new tutorial to link a checkbox to a toggle-command-state - ReaGirl: Window_ResizedFunc - adds a run-function that is always executed, when the window is resized
Changes from 5 to 5.1
- ReaGirl: General - scrollbuttons/bars are now reported to screen reader when hovering above them - ReaGirl: General - (re)scale other than 1 was positioning the window wrong -> fixed - ReaGirl: Gui_Manage - has new parameter that allows running the gui without having to add a dedicated defer-loop - ReaGirl: screenreader-messages - could be reported twice under certain circumstances; could be slow in reporting -> fixed - ReaGirl: Ext_Window_Focus - allows now focusing a dedicated ReaGirl-gui-instance, if multiple are opened with the same name - ReaGirl: Ext_Window_GetState - allows now getting window dimensions of a dedicated ReaGirl-gui-instance, if multiple are opened with the same name - ReaGirl: Ext_Window_SetState - allows now setting window dimensions of a dedicated ReaGirl-gui-instance, if multiple are opened with the same name
